meanings.definition: A person or thing that is rough or unrefined in appearance or behavior.
meanings.sent1: The roughie at the party was wearing torn jeans and a dirty t-shirt.
meanings.sent2: The playground bully was known as the roughie among the kids.
meanings.sent3: The roughie tried to impress everyone with his loud burping contest.
meanings.sent4: Her old car was a real roughie, always breaking down at the worst times.
meanings.sent5: The abandoned house looked like a haunted roughie in the moonlight.

meanings.definition: A long shot or outsider in a competition or race.
meanings.sent1: The underdog team was considered a roughie in the championship game.
meanings.sent2: The roughie horse surprised everyone by winning the race.
meanings.sent3: The roughie candidate for class president promised free ice cream every day.
meanings.sent4: She took a roughie chance by investing all her savings in the unknown company.
meanings.sent5: The roughie in the talent show turned out to be the most talented singer.
